alert.note: Alert for Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 6:26PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meade County through 700 PM MDT... At 626 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Bear Butte State Park, or 11 miles east of Sturgis, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Meade County, east of Sturgis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
